title: Promotional video of Harir typeface
content:
<iframe src="/web/20150317201951if_/http://player.vimeo.com/video/64507513" width="500" height="281" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>

author: Bahman Eslami

comments.content:
I really love the fluidity.

The peelways around 0:50 secs are fun.

Good job!
I inspire your research of modern naskh font.
